ingredients.item: 400g Waitrose Trimmed Bunched Beetroot, peeled and cut into wedges
1 tbsp essential Waitrose Creamed Horseradish Sauce
3 essential Waitrose Peppered Smoked Mackerel Fillets, skinned and boned

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200ÂºC, gas mark 6. Toss the beetroot and potatoes in 1 tbsp oil, season and roast for 20-25 minutes until tender.
Meanwhile, blend the remaining oil with the horseradish and vinegar. Toss in the mackerel, broken into pieces, watercress, beetroot and potatoes.
